creator: lexknuther@gmail.com
text:
On Windows, the javah task fails if the arguments passed to it are to long.  It
should use argument files instead.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
according to http://java.sun.com/j2se/1.5.0/docs/tooldocs/windows/javah.html javah doesn't support argument files.

WONTFIX is a CANTFIX in this case, the best we can do is document it.  Done with svn revision 795690
